name: market for housing system, cattle, tied, per animal unit | housing system, cattle, tied, per animal unit | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9840/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'housing system, cattle, tied, per animal unit', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the construction of a housing system, cattle, tied, per animal unit. The infrastructure represents a typical agricultural building for dairy cows including  rearing to 6 months with the fittings, slurry store, dung slab, dried roughage store, exercise yard and pipeline milking machine. It has a total size of 22 LU (livestock unit) and a lifetime for the building of 50 years. The process includes the construction materials, building machines, materials for repair and replacement and decommission. 

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: F:Construction/41:Construction of buildings/410:Construction of buildings/4100:Construction of buildings
tags: Sector: Infrastructure & Machinery; Agriculture & Animal Husbandry
